title: Can't buy champions or skins.
body: This problem happened from nowhere, whenever I would try to buy a champion or a skin, the buttons for it won't even be there. Restarting my game doesn't work so I'm clueless on how I can fix this issue. There are many champions that I want to buy and play and it would be great if someone can help me with this.

replies.body: I have the exactly same problem. The buttons don't even show up.

Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
